EmailTemplate.name: Shoptalk Followup.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Nice meeting you at ShopTalk
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for taking the time to speak with our team at Shoptalk. We hope you had a great conference. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Thanks for taking the time to speak with our team at Shoptalk. We hope you had a great conference. Our team is looking forward to giving you a personal tour of BigCommerce. We'll be in touch soon to schedule some time with you. Our contact information is below. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have questions or want to schedule time now.
Thanks, The BigCommerce Team ecommerceconsultant@bigcommerce.com <[[mailto:ecommerceconsultant@bigcommerce.com]]> / 1-855-884-6610 <[[tel:+18558846610]]>
